content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Jail Joa easily become my favorite place to eat and drink with friends.I've seen the place fill up starting around 9PM but haven't had an issue getting seated pretty quickly!all of the servers are super friendly and helpful!as for the food, we've tried the rose tteokbokki, kimchi cream pasta, popcorn chicken (fried or sweet n sour), and the seafood pancake.everything was tasty. highly recommend!parking: street or valet (cash). we usually valet since it's ktown and parking is a battlefield.
